title: Romano Mazzoli, Who Oversaw Major Immigration Reform, Dies at 89
description: A House Democrat, he worked across the aisle with Senator Alan K. Simpson to enable a compromise allowing amnesty for millions of undocumented immigrants.
dc:creator: Clay Risen
media:credit: CQ Roll Call, via Associated Press
media:description: Representative Romano L. Mazzoli in 1992. A Democrat, he worked with Senator Alan K. Simpson, a Republican, to make fundamental changes to the U.S. immigration system.
